pages.title: Machine Mana
pages.text: This type of Mana is produced and used by blocks. These blocks can be linked with a $(l:e_item_mana_linker)Mana Linker/el to transfer Mana between them and create a network. It is very similar to energy like RF in the way it behaves.
Important blocks that interact with Mana are the $(l:e_mana_machine_sources)Mana Sources/el and $(l:e_block_mana_relay)Relay/el.
